summary: This is an email exchange regarding the investigation of Mark Epstein. It indicates that prosecutors are awaiting direction from supervisors on who will handle the investigation but are prepared to assist with subpoenas or process in the meantime. Jose Charriez is identified as looking into the matter.

persons.name: Jose Charriez
persons.context: Identified in the email as the person who will be looking into the matter concerning Mark Epstein.

persons.name: Mark Epstein
persons.context: The individual who is the subject of the investigation discussed in the email correspondence.

connections.description: Jose Charriez is assigned to look into the matter concerning Mark Epstein.

events.title: Email regarding Mark Epstein investigation
events.description: An email exchange occurs where prosecutors discuss awaiting supervisor direction on handling the investigation into Mark Epstein and note that Jose Charriez will be looking into the matter.

keyFacts: An investigation into Mark Epstein was active as of May 2020.
Prosecutors were awaiting direction from supervisors on which office would handle the investigation.
Jose Charriez was assigned to look into the matter concerning Mark Epstein.
